ModMetaData.name: RimTerra
ModMetaData.author: KeirLoire
ModMetaData.description:
Transform various terrains into usable soil for expanding your colony's farmland and development.
- Transform various stone terrain, sand, and packed dirt into stony soil using a combination of limestone and hay. - Transform stony soil into fertile soil terrain using hay and wood. - Upgrade soil and lichen-covered soil into rich soil using neutroamine. - Transform fungal gravel into lichen-covered soil using a mixture of wood and hay.
